pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenTelemetry B3 Propagator===========================|pypi|.. |pypi| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/opentelemetry-propagator-b3.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/opentelemetry-propagator-b3/This library provides a propagator for the B3 formatInstallation------------:: pip install opentelemetry-propagator-b3References----------* `OpenTelemetry <https://opentelemetry.io/>`_* `B3 format <https://github.com/openzipkin/b3-propagation>`_
